guideline_2: Use organic farming methods to reduce chemical usage and maintain soil health.
guideline_3: Practice crop rotation to enhance soil fertility and prevent pest build-up.
guideline_4: Reduce water waste by implementing efficient irrigation techniques, like drip irrigation.
guideline_5: Minimize the use of synthetic fertilizers and pesticides to protect biodiversity.
guideline_6: Promote agroforestry and integrate trees into farming systems for ecosystem balance.
guideline_7: Encourage the use of renewable energy sources such as solar power on farms.
guideline_8: Recycle organic waste to create compost for enriching the soil.
guideline_9: Conserve native species of plants and animals to maintain the ecological balance.
guideline_10: Improve farm resilience by diversifying crops and livestock to withstand climate variability.
